text: Alex Rely also known as The Peruvian Brown Panther (18 July 1898 â€” 1966) was a Peruvian boxer. He competed in the middleweight category. He fought between 1918 and 1928. De Boer made his debut on 1 June 1918 in Iquique against Jim Johnson and won on points. During his career he had 49 fights, winning 29 of them (13 losses, 4 draws). He became continental champion in 1926. ==References== Category:Peruvian sportspeople Category:boxers Category:1898 births Category:1966 deaths
title: Alex Rely
